text: Marmalade is a topping, like a jam or jelly, that is usually made with oranges. Marmalade can also be made from lemons, limes, grapefruits, or a combination of citrus fruits. The word Marmalade comes from the Galician word "marmelada" meaning quince jam. == Related pages == * Marmalade (Candy) == Other websites == Category:Spreads
title: Marmalade
